title: You Can't Silence Me

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert someone into a ~~Locust~~ You Can't Silence Me during the night. Every Night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can talk with other Locusts and You Can't Silence Mes during the night
- No restrictions, ~~unless stated otherwise,~~ at all, as to whom can be converted to a ~~Locust~~ You Can't Silence Me. Additionally, each ~~Locust~~ You Can't Silence Me player may convert during the night.
- Cope, Seethe, and Mald

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert every living player into a ~~Locust~~ You Can't Silence Me.

desc:
Post 1409
*For when Locust isn't enough.*

Post 40 Locust but it bypasses extra conversion immunity and regular conversion immunity and any conversion immunity ever. It also converts people to You Can't Silence me, and the goal is to convert every living player into a You Can't Silence Me. This talks with both Locusts and with You Can't Silence Me. It appears as Locusts to Locusts.

This role can't be copied or have its ability copied
